blocks.text: The LD-5 is a 5-band (40m, 30m, 20m, 17m, 15m) SDR/DSP transceiver supporting SSB, CW, and digital modes. Features include dual VFO, 100 memories per band, built-in SWR/power meter, and electronic iambic keyer.
Front panel buttons: ON/OFF, UP/DOWN arrows (band change in normal mode, menu navigation in menu mode), MODE (CW/CWR/LSB/USB/DIGI), VFO (A/B select), STEP (1/10/100/1000 Hz tuning rate).

LOCK prevents accidental tuning. RIT allows receive frequency offset - asterisk (*) shows RIT=0, arrows (< >) show direction of offset. PRE/ATT cycles through preamp (+16dB), normal, attenuator (-10dB).
The LD-5 can receive 160m and 80m (RX only) by adjusting Begin Frequency in Service Mode. Store band edges in memory locations for quick recall.
Press MENU to enter menu mode, MENU again to exit. Navigate with UP/DOWN arrows, adjust with VFO knob.

blocks.name: AGC
blocks.description: AGC speed from 1-20. 1 is slowest, 20 is fastest.

blocks.name: PITCH CW
blocks.description: Sidetone and CW offset pitch (400-1000 Hz). Changes take effect when exiting Menu mode.

blocks.name: CW SPEED
blocks.description: 5-60 WPM. Takes effect when exiting Menu mode.

blocks.name: CW VOX
blocks.description: Break-in delay, 100ms to 5 seconds in 100ms steps.

blocks.name: NOTCH FILTER
blocks.description: Auto-notch depth -6dB to -40dB. SSB mode only.

blocks.name: NOISE BLANKER
blocks.description: Adjustable 4-12. 4 is maximum blanking.

blocks.name: NOISE REDUCTION
blocks.description: Level 1-100. Use minimum necessary setting.

blocks.name: FILTER
blocks.description: Filter #4 is customizable. CW: 50-2400Hz. SSB: Low 250Hz to High 3400Hz. Press F+Filter to adjust.

blocks.name: LED MODE
blocks.description: Forever (always on) or Auto (3-second timeout). Backlight off saves 40mA.

blocks.name: SSB COMPRESSOR
blocks.description: Mic compression 0-100 (100 = 20dB compression).

blocks.name: SSB VOX
blocks.description: VOX delay 100ms to 5 seconds. DISABLE turns off VOX.

blocks.text: Electronic iambic keyer with Mode A and B selectable. Speed 5-60 WPM. Weight (dash ratio) adjustable. Reverse paddle option available.

blocks.name: CW KEY TYPE
blocks.description: SIMPLE = hand key, AUTO = paddle.

blocks.name: IAMBIC MODE
blocks.description: Switch between Iambic Mode A and Mode B.

blocks.name: REVERSE CW KEY
blocks.description: Swap dot and dash paddle sides.

blocks.text: DSP-based filtering with 8 preset filters (4 each for CW and SSB). Filters 1-3 are factory presets; Filter 4 is user-adjustable.
CW Filter 4: 50-2400 Hz adjustable. Press F+Filter, use VFO to set bandwidth.
SSB Filter 4: Low end 250 Hz to High end 3400 Hz. Press F+Filter, use VFO for low end, press RIT to toggle to high end.
Automatic heterodyne notch filter for SSB (-6dB to -40dB). Noise Blanker (4-12) and Noise Reduction (1-100) available.
Built-in SWR protection reduces power automatically above 3:1 SWR. At 10:1 SWR, output drops to 1%.
The LD-5 does not include an internal antenna tuner. Built-in SWR and power meter displays during transmit.

blocks.name: TX METER
blocks.description: Select Bar Graph (Scaler) or Watts (Number) display.

blocks.name: SHOW TX
blocks.description: Select Power in Watts or VSWR display.

blocks.name: Power output drops unexpectedly
blocks.description: Built-in ALC/SWR protection reduces power above 3:1 SWR. Check antenna match.

blocks.name: Display symbols: R, N, B
blocks.description: R = Noise Reduction active, N = Notch Filter active, B = Noise Blanker active. Toggle with F+UP, F+MODE, F+DOWN respectively.

blocks.name: Service Mode entry
blocks.description: Power OFF, then power ON while holding F button. Release F when firmware page appears. Contact LNR Support before making Service Mode adjustments.

blocks.name: Digital mode setup
blocks.description: Connect USB, power, and antenna BEFORE powering on. Then power radio, then start software. Use Line IN/OUT jack for digital interface.
